animeDescription: Tortov Roddle is a man of few words on a journey through a calm and obscure new land, interacting with its inhabitants along the way. As he rides on his long-legged pig through the desert from town to town, he observes the interesting and quirky customs of the locals and reminisces about his past.[Written by MAL Rewrite]
animeRelated: ['Side story: Aru Tabibito no Nikki Specials']
